verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> became הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And [when] the people כְּמִתְאֹ֣נְנִ֔ים <WH596> complained רַ֖ע <WH7451> of adversity בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> the hearing יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> heard יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD וַיִּ֣חַר <WH2734> was kindled אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> [it] and his anger וַתִּבְעַר־ <WH1197> burnt בָּם֙ אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> and the fire יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַתֹּ֖אכַל <WH398> among them and consumed בִּקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> [them that were] in the uttermost parts הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> of the camp

וַיִּצְעַ֥ק <WH6817> cried הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And the people אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> unto Moses וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <WH6419> prayed מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> and when Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַתִּשְׁקַ֖ע <WH8257> was quenched הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> the fire

וַיִּקְרָ֛א <WH7121> And he called שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> of the תַּבְעֵרָ֑ה <WH8404> Taberah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because בָעֲרָ֥ה <WH1197> burnt בָ֖ם אֵ֥שׁ <WH784> because the fire יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְהָֽאסַפְסֻף֙ <WH628> And the mixt multitude אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּקִרְבּ֔וֹ <WH7130> that [was] among הִתְאַוּ֖וּ <WH183> had תַּאֲוָ֑ה <WH8378> greedy וַיָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <WH7725> again וַיִּבְכּ֗וּ <WH1058> also wept גַּ֚ם <WH1571> and also בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said מִ֥י <WH4310> Who יַאֲכִלֵ֖נוּ <WH398> to eat בָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> Who shall give us flesh

זָכַ֙רְנוּ֙ <WH2142> We remember אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּגָ֔ה <WH1710> the fish אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> which we did eat בְּמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> in Egypt חִנָּ֑ם <WH2600> freely אֵ֣ת <WH853> הַקִּשֻּׁאִ֗ים <WH7180> the cucumbers וְאֵת֙ <WH853> הָֽאֲבַטִּחִ֔ים <WH20> and the melons וְאֶת־ <WH853> הֶחָצִ֥יר <WH2682> and the leeks וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּצָלִ֖ים <WH1211> and the onions וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשּׁוּמִֽים׃ <WH7762> and the garlick

וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> now נַפְשֵׁ֥נוּ <WH5315> But now our soul יְבֵשָׁ֖ה <WH3002> [is] dried away אֵ֣ין <WH369> There כֹּ֑ל <WH3605> all בִּלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> [there is] nothing at all beside אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמָּ֥ן <WH4478> this manna עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5869> [before] our eyes

וְהַמָּ֕ן <WH4478> And the manna כִּזְרַע־ <WH2233> seed גַּ֖ד <WH1407> [was] as coriander ה֑וּא <WH1931> and its וְעֵינ֖וֹ <WH5869> and the colour כְּעֵ֥ין <WH5869> thereof as the colour הַבְּדֹֽלַח׃ <WH916> of bdellium

שָׁטוּ֩ <WH7751> went about הָעָ֨ם <WH5971> [And] the people וְלָֽקְט֜וּ <WH3950> and gathered וְטָחֲנ֣וּ <WH2912> [it] and ground בָרֵחַ֗יִם <WH7347> [it] in mills א֤וֹ <WH176> or דָכוּ֙ <WH1743> or beat בַּמְּדֹכָ֔ה <WH4085> [it] in a mortar וּבִשְּׁלוּ֙ <WH1310> and baked בַּפָּר֔וּר <WH6517> [it] in pans וְעָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> and made אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> עֻג֑וֹת <WH5692> cakes וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become טַעְמ֔וֹ <WH2940> of it and the taste כְּטַ֖עַם <WH2940> of it was as the taste לְשַׁ֥ד <WH3955> of fresh הַשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> oil

וּבְרֶ֧דֶת <WH3381> fell הַטַּ֛ל <WH2919> And when the dew עַל־ <WH5921> on הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> upon the camp לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> in the night יֵרֵ֥ד <WH3381> fell הַמָּ֖ן <WH4478> the manna עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <WH8085> heard מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> Then Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> the people בֹּכֶה֙ <WH1058> weep לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔יו <WH4940> throughout their families אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man לְפֶ֣תַח <WH6607> in the door אָהֳל֑וֹ <WH168> of his tent וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֤ף <WH639> and the anger יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> greatly וּבְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> affliction מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> Moses רָֽע׃ <WH7451> adversity

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לָמָ֤ה <WH4100> Why הֲרֵעֹ֙תָ֙ <WH7489> Wherefore hast thou afflicted לְעַבְדֶּ֔ךָ <WH5650> bondage וְלָ֛מָּה <WH4100> Why לֹא־ <WH3808> not מָצָ֥תִי <WH4672> found חֵ֖ן <WH2580> favour בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight לָשׂ֗וּם <WH7760> that thou layest אֶת־ <WH853> מַשָּׂ֛א <WH4853> the burden כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> of all this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> and

הֶאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> have I הָרִ֗יתִי <WH2029> Have I conceived אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> folk הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אִם־ <WH518> lo אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> them יְלִדְתִּ֑יהוּ <WH3205> forth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תֹאמַ֨ר <WH559> them that thou shouldest say אֵלַ֜י <WH413> to me שָׂאֵ֣הוּ <WH5375> unto me Carry בְחֵיקֶ֗ךָ <WH2436> them in thy bosom כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> beareth הָאֹמֵן֙ <WH539> as a nursing father אֶת־ <WH853> הַיֹּנֵ֔ק <WH3243> the sucking child עַ֚ל <WH5921> unto הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֖עְתָּ <WH7650> which thou swarest לַאֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1> fathers

מֵאַ֤יִן <WH370> Whence לִי֙ בָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> should I have flesh לָתֵ֖ת <WH5414> to give לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> folk הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יִבְכּ֤וּ <WH1058> bewail עָלַי֙ <WH5921> before לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto me saying תְּנָה־ <WH5414> Give לָּ֥נוּ בָשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> us flesh וְנֹאכֵֽלָה׃ <WH398> that we may eat

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> am not אוּכַ֤ל <WH3201> I am not able אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I לְבַדִּ֔י <WH905> alone לָשֵׂ֖את <WH5375> to bear אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> all this people הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this כִּ֥י <WH3588> because כָבֵ֖ד <WH3515> because [it is] too heavy מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> is too

וְאִם־ <WH518> if כָּ֣כָה ׀ <WH3602> thus אַתְּ־ <WH859> you עֹ֣שֶׂה <WH6213> And if thou deal לִּ֗י הָרְגֵ֤נִי <WH2026> thus with me kill נָא֙ <WH4994> please הָרֹ֔ג <WH2026> me I pray thee out of hand אִם־ <WH518> if מָצָ֥אתִי <WH4672> if I have found חֵ֖ן <WH2580> favour בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight וְאַל־ <WH408> not אֶרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> and let me not see בְּרָעָתִֽי׃ <WH7451> my wretchedness פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses אֶסְפָה־ <WH622> Gather לִּ֞י שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> unto me seventy אִישׁ֮ <WH376> men מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom יָדַ֔עְתָּ <WH3045> whom thou knowest כִּי־ <WH3588> for הֵ֛ם <WH1992> like זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> to be the elders הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people וְשֹׁטְרָ֑יו <WH7860> and officers וְלָקַחְתָּ֤ <WH3947> over them and bring אֹתָם֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> them unto the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְהִֽתְיַצְּב֥וּ <WH3320> that they may stand שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

וְיָרַדְתִּ֗י <WH3381> And I will come down וְדִבַּרְתִּ֣י <WH1696> and talk עִמְּךָ֮ <WH5973> you שָׁם֒ <WH8033> there וְאָצַלְתִּ֗י <WH680> with thee there and I will take מִן־ <WH4480> at הָר֛וּחַ <WH7307> of the spirit אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> and וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <WH7760> which [is] upon thee and will put עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> and they וְנָשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> [it] upon them and they shall bear אִתְּךָ֙ <WH854> for בְּמַשָּׂ֣א <WH4853> the burden הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people וְלֹא־ <WH3808> you will not תִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> with thee that thou bear אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> all לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH905> alone

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֨ם <WH5971> thou unto the people תֹּאמַ֜ר <WH559> And say הִתְקַדְּשׁ֣וּ <WH6942> Sanctify לְמָחָר֮ <WH4279> yourselves against to morrow וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֣ם <WH398> and ye shall eat בָּשָׂר֒ <WH1320> flesh כִּ֡י <WH3588> for בְּכִיתֶם֩ <WH1058> for ye have wept בְּאָזְנֵ֨י <WH241> in the ears יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying מִ֤י <WH4310> Oh יַאֲכִלֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH398> to eat בָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> Who shall give us flesh כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֥וֹב <WH2895> ? for [it was] well לָ֖נוּ בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> with us in Egypt וְנָתַ֨ן <WH5414> will give יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> therefore the LORD לָכֶ֛ם בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> you flesh וַאֲכַלְתֶּֽם׃ <WH398> and ye shall eat

לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor י֥וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> one תֹּאכְל֖וּן <WH398> Ye shall not eat וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יוֹמָ֑יִם <WH3117> nor two days וְלֹ֣א ׀ <WH3808> nor חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> nor five יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> days וְלֹא֙ <WH3808> nor עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <WH6235> neither ten יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> nor עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> nor twenty יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> days

עַ֣ד ׀ <WH5704> against חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> A whole עַ֤ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יֵצֵא֙ <WH3318> until it come out מֵֽאַפְּכֶ֔ם <WH639> at your nostrils וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> and becomes לָכֶ֖ם לְזָרָ֑א <WH2214> and it be loathsome יַ֗עַן <WH3282> unto you because כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מְאַסְתֶּ֤ם <WH3988> that ye have despised אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֔ם <WH7130> which [is] among וַתִּבְכּ֤וּ <WH1058> you and have wept לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> before לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> him saying לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why זֶּ֖ה <WH2088> ever יָצָ֥אנוּ <WH3318> Why came we forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> Egypt

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> said מֹשֶׁה֒ <WH4872> And Moses שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> whom I [am] [are] six מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> thousand רַגְלִ֔י <WH7273> footmen הָעָ֕ם <WH5971> The people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ <WH7130> among וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You אָמַ֗רְתָּ <WH559> and thou hast said בָּשָׂר֙ <WH1320> them flesh אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> I will give לָהֶ֔ם וְאָכְל֖וּ <WH398> that they may eat חֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> a whole

הֲצֹ֧אן <WH6629> Shall the flocks וּבָקָ֛ר <WH1241> and the herds יִשָּׁחֵ֥ט <WH7819> be slain לָהֶ֖ם וּמָצָ֣א <WH4672> for them to suffice לָהֶ֑ם אִ֣ם <WH518> Or אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דְּגֵ֥י <WH1709> them? or shall all the fish הַיָּ֛ם <WH3220> of the sea יֵאָסֵ֥ף <WH622> be gathered together לָהֶ֖ם וּמָצָ֥א <WH4672> for them to suffice לָהֶֽם׃ פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses הֲיַ֥ד <WH3027> hand יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Is the LORD'S תִּקְצָ֑ר <WH7114> waxed short עַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> henceforth תִרְאֶ֛ה <WH7200> ? thou shalt see הֲיִקְרְךָ֥ <WH7136> shall come to pass דְבָרִ֖י <WH1697> now whether my word אִם־ <WH518> or לֹֽא׃ <WH3808> not

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> went out מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses וַיְדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> and told אֶל־ <WH413> about הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people אֵ֖ת <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> the words יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֶּאֱסֹ֞ף <WH622> and gathered שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> the seventy אִישׁ֙ <WH582> another מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> of the elders הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people וַֽיַּעֲמֵ֥ד <WH5975> and set אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> סְבִיבֹ֥ת <WH5439> them round about הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> the tabernacle

וַיֵּ֨רֶד <WH3381> came down יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> And the LORD בֶּעָנָן֮ <WH6051> in a cloud וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> and spake אֵלָיו֒ <WH413> to him וַיָּ֗אצֶל <WH680> unto him and took מִן־ <WH4480> at הָר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> of the spirit אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and וַיִּתֵּ֕ן <WH5414> that [was] upon him and gave עַל־ <WH5921> upon שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> [it] unto the seventy אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> he הַזְּקֵנִ֑ים <WH2205> elders וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כְּנ֤וֹחַ <WH5117> rested עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> and when הָר֔וּחַ <WH7307> and it came to pass [that] when the spirit וַיִּֽתְנַבְּא֖וּ <WH5012> upon them they prophesied וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not יָסָֽפוּ׃ <WH3254> and did not cease
